Html:
Anybody out there? 

I know that I just updated the DK stuff for 4.1.  Any thing else going on interesting?
Doing some more WoL analysis for the Boss Handler and bug fixes as reported (well, when people follow the posting guidelines).
I do have private stuff going on so my time on Rawr is limited. But I'm working on the rotation. Plus Retribution has nothing new for 4.1.

I should probably switch PTR mode off and mainline the Moonkin changes, but it's not a lot.  Things have been fairly static right now and I've had a lot of RL going on that's keeping me from doing the fancy things like multiple target support and better movement calculations.
Yes, please target your code to 4.1.0, I'm not going to be posting a release until after it's out.
You'd have to work quick if you wanted to. ;P
